hero.paragraph: Design captivating Pharmascan and collaborate in real-time from any device.

items.title: Process, People, Technology
items.description: Our ability to connect process, people, and technology is how we build solutions to support organizations around the world.

items.title: Capture, Track, and Integrate
items.description: At the heart of our technical expertise lies our ability to capture, track, and seamlessly integrate data throughout your operations.

items.title: Continuous Improvement
items.description: We continuously strive to eliminate operational friction and enhance user experiences.

scancards.title: Speed up everyday work
scancards.description: If you’re not used to barcodes, it might not be clear how they might help you get work done faster. Here are a few examples of how inFlow’s barcode inventory system can help:

items.title: Scan to receive
items.description: Update inventory instantly upon product arrival.

items.title: Scan to pick accurately
items.description: Verify the correct product for each order in real-time.

items.title: Scan to check stock
items.description: Conduct immediate stock verifications on the floor.

items.title: Scan to adjust stock
items.description: Adjust inventory quantities for discrepancies or damages on the spot.

items.title: Scan to transfer stock
items.description: Manage inventory transfers between locations efficiently.

items.title: Scan to look up orders
items.description: Quickly access and review purchase and sales orders by scanning associated barcodes.

sections.title: About EzERP
sections.content: EzERP significantly reduces costs associated with workforce allocation and administrative tasks by integrating barcode technology. This solution ensures accurate inventory data at every stage—receiving, shipping, storage, and picking—enhancing operational efficiency and data accuracy.

sections.title: Barcode Module
sections.content: The integrated system thus maximizes the accuracy of the data collection and improves overall efficiency. A barcode system that is getting real-time data from the ERP and feeds real-time data back to the ERP solution will ensure timely delivery and accurate shipments. This will thereby improve customer’s response time and service.

sections.title: Barcoding
sections.content: Companies choose EzERP because we excel at solving logistical and operational problems, making daily operations smoother and more efficient. Our barcode system enhances accuracy and connectivity across all operations, driving significant improvements in workflow efficiency.

sections.title: Beautify with Thunderbees Designer
sections.content: EzERP controls incoming and outgoing shipments through enforceable rules, codes, and customizable routes. It employs strategic put-away methods, such as analyzing slow and fast movers, and uses cross-docking to optimize storage and reduce movement distance.

sections.title: Our Vision
sections.content: Our vision is to be the leader in intelligent EzERP Barcode Module solutions. We aim for a future where every product tells its story securely and transparently. We envision unprecedented operational efficiency for businesses and paramount customer trust, making supply chains fully agile and information readily accessible.

sections.title: Mission
sections.content: Our mission is to empower businesses with a secure and fast EzERP Barcode Module. We enable real-time product information updates for consumers, from receiving to last-mile shipment. This ensures data integrity, streamlines operations, and enhances customer experience by communicating features and benefits effectively.

questions.question: Where can I use Thunderbees PharmaScan?
questions.answer: Thunderbees PharmaScan is available as an app for desktop (Windows and MacOS), on mobile devices and tablets (iOS and Android™), and online through your browser.

questions.question: Is there a free version of Thunderbees PharmaScan?
questions.answer: Yes, Thunderbees PharmaScan for the web is free for anyone to use online. <link>Sign up or sign in</link> using any email address.

questions.question: Can I collaborate with other people in Thunderbees PharmaScan?
questions.answer: Yes, Thunderbees PharmaScan supports real-time collaboration with multiple people.

questions.question: In what languages is Thunderbees PharmaScan available?
questions.answer: Thunderbees PharmaScan is available in more than <link>80 languages</link>.

resourcesSection.title: Why EzERP Barcode Module
resourcesSection.desc: EzERP harnesses advanced EDI/invoicing capabilities to accelerate the receiving process significantly. Upon receipt, barcodes on invoices are automatically scanned, instantly identifying and correlating with Purchase Orders (PO). This automated matching speeds up the verification process, ensures all items are accounted for immediately, eliminates manual errors, and integrates seamlessly with accounting modules to update financial records in real-time.
